thread.title: Chelsea still in talks to sign Franck Kessie in January but Atalanta are holding out for summer deal
thread.title_full: Chelsea still in talks to sign Franck Kessie in January but Atalanta are holding out for summer deal

author: simon johnson
title: Chelsea still in talks to sign Franck Kessie in January but Atalanta are holding out for summer deal
text:
Getty Images 
Chelsea are still in negotiations with Atalanta over the signing of 20-year-old midfielder Franck Kessie . 
Antonio Conte’s side are trying to buy him this month, although Atalanta are doing their utmost to postpone any potential deal until the end of the season. 
Kessie's agent claimed Chelsea had a £21.3m bid rejected for the Ivory Coast international last week, although it is understood no formal offer had been made at the time. 
But Chelsea's pursuit of Kessie has raised more question marks over Loftus-Cheek's current role at the club, where he has also fallen behind Nathaniel Chalobah in the pecking order. Chelsea ready to loan Loftus-Cheek with Brighton and West Ham keen 
Standard Sport understands that Championship side Brighton are looking to take the 20-year-old on loan, while West Ham are also interested in the midfielder. 
Loftus-Cheek has started just two games — both in the EFL Cup — for new coach Antonio Conte. His only other appearance was as a late substitute in a League game in October. Last term, the England Under-21 international featured 17 times for Chelsea.
